community.name: Golden Pond Retirement Community
community.overview: Golden Pond Retirement Community is a locally owned senior‑living campus in Golden, Colorado. Nestled at the base of North Table Mountain, our vibrant community offers independent living, assisted living and memory care on a scenic seven‑acre campus.
community.description:
**Mission and Philosophy**

Golden Pond's mission is to provide a vibrant home where care meets compassion.  Our locally owned campus fosters personalized support and independence in a beautiful mountain setting.  Residents enjoy adaptive care at every stage, from independent living to assisted living and memory care, backed by on‑site access to concierge physicians and rehabilitation partners.

**Lifestyle & Activities**

Residents stay engaged through a robust life‑enrichment program.  Weekly clubs range from creative writing, men's club and resident council to tech and food committees.  Outdoor recreation includes walking clubs, flower arranging, nature walks, gardening and trishaw bike rides.  Fun pursuits such as lecture series, trivia, live music, pet therapy, happy hours, dancing and intergenerational activities create a lively social calendar.  Special occasions include picnics, holiday celebrations, scenic drives and outings to museums, sports games and fishing.

**Amenities & Environment**

Our scenic campus features covered patios, water features, garden sculptures and pergolas.  Enjoy restaurant‑style dining with à‑la‑carte selections, daily specials and fresh seasonal ingredients, plus grab‑and‑go cafés and private family dining rooms.  The property offers a fitness center, salon, library, outdoor walking loops, Peace of Mind fall‑detection technology, pet‑friendly policies and inviting living areas with fireplaces.  Apartments are spacious—studio, one‑bedroom or two‑bedroom—and include full kitchens or kitchenettes, housekeeping, utilities, Wi‑Fi, Comcast extended package and emergency call systems.

**Care Options**

Independent living features 39 one‑ and two‑bedroom residences with bi‑weekly housekeeping, linen changes, transportation and scenic mountain views.  Assisted living provides 76 apartments with weekly housekeeping, linen changes, trash service and 24‑hour staff, plus access to a modern bistro, fitness center, salon and movie theater.  Memory care offers 15 private suites with specialized support and secure outdoor access, focusing on residents' abilities rather than limitations.
community.short_description: Locally owned senior living in Golden, CO offering independent, assisted and memory care with scenic mountain views.
community.seo_title: Golden Pond Retirement Community | Senior Living in Golden, CO
community.seo_description: Golden Pond is a locally owned retirement community in Golden, Colorado offering independent living, assisted living and memory care.

care_types.name: Independent Living
care_types.description: One‑ and two‑bedroom apartments with full kitchens, housekeeping, Wi‑Fi, transportation and mountain views.

care_types.name: Assisted Living
care_types.description: 76 spacious apartments offering tailored support with housekeeping, linen service, meals and modern amenities.

care_types.name: Memory Care
care_types.description: Private suites with secure access and person‑centered support focused on each resident's abilities.

amenities.name: Restaurant‑Style Dining
amenities.description: À‑la‑carte menus, daily specials and fresh seasonal ingredients served in multiple dining venues.

amenities.name: Grab‑and‑Go Cafés
amenities.description: Convenient cafés for coffee, snacks and light fare.

amenities.name: Private Dining Rooms
amenities.description: Family dining rooms available for special occasions and celebrations.

amenities.name: Fitness Center
amenities.description: Modern facility for exercise classes and strength training.

amenities.name: Full‑Service Salon
amenities.description: On‑site salon providing hair and spa services.

amenities.name: Library
amenities.description: Quiet space with a wide selection of books and periodicals.

amenities.name: Outdoor Walking Paths
amenities.description: Beautifully landscaped walking loops with benches, patios, pergolas and water features.

amenities.name: Pet Friendly
amenities.description: Residents are welcome to bring their small pets.

amenities.name: Peace of Mind Technology
amenities.description: Fall‑detection and emergency call systems for enhanced safety.

amenities.name: Movie Theater
amenities.description: On‑site theater offering film nights and entertainment.

floor_plans.name: Studio Suite
floor_plans.description: Open‑concept studio with kitchenette, large windows and emergency call system.

floor_plans.name: One‑Bedroom Apartment
floor_plans.description: Spacious one‑bedroom layout with full kitchen, separate living room and balcony.

floor_plans.name: Two‑Bedroom Apartment
floor_plans.description: Large two‑bedroom residence with full kitchen, two baths and scenic views.

features.title: Personalized Care at Every Stage
features.body: Our seasoned, highly trained staff provide individualized attention while encouraging independence.  We tailor support for independent, assisted and memory care residents.

features.title: Engaging Activities & Social Events
features.body: From creative writing and gardening clubs to live music and intergenerational programs, our calendar offers endless opportunities for connection and fun.

features.title: Scenic Campus & Modern Amenities
features.body: Experience our seven‑acre campus with outdoor walking paths, patios, pergolas and water features, plus a fitness center, salon, library and movie theater.

highlights.title: Stunning Mountain Views
highlights.description: Breathtaking vistas of North Table Mountain and the Colorado foothills.

highlights.title: Locally Owned & Operated
highlights.description: A community with a personal touch—independent ownership ensures responsive leadership and a family feel.

highlights.title: Continuum of Care
highlights.description: Independent, assisted and memory care options allow residents to age in place.

faqs.question: What is included in the monthly rate?
faqs.answer: Monthly rates include housekeeping, utilities, Wi‑Fi, cable, meals, transportation, activities and 24‑hour staff support.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed?
faqs.answer: Yes!  Residents may bring small pets and enjoy our pet‑friendly outdoor spaces.

faqs.question: Do apartments have kitchens?
faqs.answer: Independent and assisted living apartments feature full kitchens or kitchenettes with modern appliances.

galleries.title: Beautiful Grounds & Surroundings
galleries.description: Explore our scenic seven‑acre campus at the base of North Table Mountain.

events.title: Annual Classic Car Show
events.summary: Celebrate vintage automobiles with live music and food.
events.description: Join us for our annual car show featuring classic vehicles, live entertainment and delicious food.  Residents and guests can vote for their favorite cars and enjoy a festive afternoon on the main lawn.

events.title: Happy Hour Fridays
events.summary: Weekly social hour with drinks, music and camaraderie.
events.description: Every Friday at 4 p.m. residents gather for happy hour in our Bistro.  Enjoy wine, cocktails, live piano music and the company of friends.
